WorkItem.Description:
The data grid control does not override OnAccessKey.
 
This gives different behavior for "entering" a data grid for tab navigation vs "entering" a datagrid via an accelerator key.
Using tab navigation, the first cell in the grid will receive focus.
 
Using an accelerator key to access the grid will only put focus on the grid its self, and will not enter the first cell of the grid.
 
Both means of navigation should probably be consistent with each other. I.e. either both should just focus the grid or both should just focus the cell.

Comments.Message: We agree this is a bug, and we've filed a bug in our internal database to be fixed in a future release.
